attributes.action: Stop the killing of Burma Muslims
attributes.additional_details: The rohingya Muslims were getting butchered women were getting raped families are getting buried alive and poured petrol on by the Myanmar army and all the countries wanna just sit back and do nothing China America wanna back this vile act and well our beautiful country wanna follow as tony Blair did with George bush in the war on Iran Iraq they got £32 million pounds to give to america for hurricane what about the people who are suffering in Burma
attributes.background: Burmese troops are murdering children and raping women. I’m horrified that the UK backs the army behind this
